title: Entire purchase history of my account
body: Where can I check that? I've spent quite a bit on league but I didn't keep track of how much

replies.body: Purchase history should be available through the client for the last 90 days.  The entire history can also be made available through the [Privacy Page](http://privacy.riotgames.com/en_US/), though it will require a small fee to process.  I hope that helps!
